backend/main.mo: Defines the actor's data models and comparison helpers for graves, deceased persons, cemetery state, and site content including new public sections.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old persistent site content to the new format by adding a default cemeteryInformation section and returning an updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence flags.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten high‑level summaries of major frontend files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme color tokens and applying them to base elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling theme, routing, identity, profile setup, and lazy loading of public and admin views.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGrave: Shows an interactive cemetery map with grave tiles, status legend, and a dialog for editing selected graves.
frontend/src/components/admin/CemeteryLa: Provides UI for managing cemetery layout, allowing admins to add or remove alleys and graves.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveEditD: Dialog for creating or editing a grave, including fields for status, deceased persons, owner, and payment data.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveManag: Admin interface for searching, listing, paginating, and creating graves, with lazy‑loaded edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/imageEditi: Utility functions for loading, converting, and resizing images, returning data suitable for uploads.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageUploa: Handles image upload, validation, preview, resizing, and saving via ExternalBlob with progress tracking.
Generates a cemetery graves PDF by fetching cemetery and grave data, building HTML, and triggering a download with loading state.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin UI for editing site content including hero section, footer info, prayer text, and cemetery text with image upload support.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Shows connection status with loading or error alerts based on actor availability.
frontend/src/components/FloatingLoginCon: Floating login button for anonymous users invoking Internet Identity with tooltip and loading guard.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer, loading contact data from the backend with fallbacks and displaying address, contact details, office hours, bank info, and a website link.
frontend/src/components/GraveResultsList: Displays public or admin grave search results with status badges and optional editing for admins, handling empty states and count display.
frontend/src/components/GraveSearch.tsx: Provides an in‑memory grave search UI for public and admin modes, loading data, filtering results, and showing counts with pagination for admins.
frontend/src/components/GraveTileMap.tsx: Renders a tile‑based cemetery map using public tile and layout data, showing status‑colored graves with tooltips and a legend.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the site header with logo, title, theme toggle, and optional logout, using public site content for a customizable logo.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Shows a hero banner with a configurable background, title, and introductory text, loading content from the backend with fallbacks and skeletons.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal prompting new users to enter and save their profile details, validating input and showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/PublicSectionsTi: Renders a grid of selectable public section tiles with icons that trigger onSelect when clicked.
frontend/src/components/SiteContentLoadE: Displays an alert banner indicating site content failed to load, with an optional custom message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend data with caching, retry logic, error formatting, and mutation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tabbed sections that lazy‑load management components like graves, maps, layout, search, exports, and site content.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPage.tsx: Displays the public-facing page with hero content, section tiles, and lazy‑loaded grave search and map, plus optional prayer and about sections.
frontend/src/utils/graveFullTextSearch.t: Provides in‑memory full‑text search utilities for admin and public grave data with different searchable fields.
frontend/src/utils/graveStatusStyles.ts: Defines consistent styling, labels, and legend colors for different grave statuses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, containers, animations, and custom CSS variables for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema version, overall system summary, and a list of existing features covering authentication, actor initialization, access control, UX messaging, user profiles, and cemetery state APIs. Serves as a canonical inventory of implemented functionality for planning and tracking.
